articles.title: GAC's "Eco-system Globalization" Lands in Brazil, Marking Strategic Milestone in Latin America's Footprint.  May. 25, 2025 23:37
org: Instituto Nacional de Metrologia, Qualidade e Tecnologia
articles.summary: GAC launched its "Brazil Action Plan" and unveiled five new models: AION V, AION Y, HYPTEC HT, GS4 HEV, and AION ES, at an event in São Paulo, Brazil. The new models aim to address various mobility needs of Brazilian consumers, showcasing GAC's commitment to the Brazilian market.

articles.title: 27 Cheap Treat Alternatives To Trendy Name-Brand Items
articles.author: Katy Herman
articles.summary: NYX introduces Shine Loud liquid lipstick offering long-lasting, transfer-resistant color. E.l.f. launches the Power Grip Primer providing expensive-quality results at an affordable price. Physicians Formula releases Diamond Dust setting powder providing a glowy finish. Amazon Basics offers reusable silicone baking mats as an alternative to splurgier options.

articles.title: 47 Cheap Product Swaps You'll Wish You'd Made Earlier
articles.author: Elizabeth Lilly
articles.summary: Several companies are offering new affordable alternatives to popular products. Nortiv 8 provides walking shoes, while Gold Bond offers firming neck and chest cream. Good Molecules introduces exfoliating powder and eye gel. Additionally, E.l.f. has launched a lash mascara, soft glam foundation, melting lip balm and halo glow liquid filter. Dossier and Etude have also introduced new perfumes and lip tints.

articles.title: Samsung brings experiential activation to life as Major Partner of Vivid Sydney 2025
articles.author: Alisha Buaya
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics Australia launched 'Space to Dream' at Vivid Sydney, showcasing the Galaxy S25 series and Galaxy AI. Visitors can experience the new devices and features through immersive zones and interactive installations. The activation aims to inspire Australians to dream and leverage technology for creativity and task management.

articles.title: Study Buddy (Explorer): China's ‘Dairy Godfather' and his booming ice cream empire
articles.author: We Cover The Latest News
articles.summary: Niu Gensheng, founder of Mengniu Dairy, launched Aice, an ice cream brand targeting the Southeast Asian market in 2015. Aice focused on affordable pricing and catered to local preferences with flavors like durian and coconut milk coffee, providing free freezers and electricity subsidies to small shops. By focusing on high volume sales and reasonable prices Aice grew to be the top ice cream brand in Southeast Asia.

articles.title: Lidl Ireland fans set for frenzy over new Dyson vacuum dupe with powerful motor – and it's €450 cheaper
articles.author: Macarten Burke
articles.summary: Lidl Ireland is selling the Beldray 2-in-1 Handheld Vacuum Cleaner for €49.99. The vacuum can be used as handheld or upright, comes with a 600W motor, HEPA filter, and a crevice tool. It's available in stores nationwide until May 28.

articles.title: 7 Google Maps tips to use with Android Auto and CarPlay
articles.author: David Nield
articles.summary: Google Maps is adding new features accessible through Android Auto and Apple CarPlay. Users can now customize the vehicle icon and color on the map. The service also allows users to search for and add stops like gas stations or coffee shops during navigation without interrupting turn-by-turn directions.

articles.title: 35 Ridiculous Home Products You'll Be Glad To Own
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Several new and unique products are introduced, including Death Wish Instant Coffee Packets with high caffeine content, "I'm A Total Spud" Seasoning for potatoes, and Birdie, an indoor carbon dioxide monitor.  Additionally, Otherland is launching a tennis-inspired "Matchpoint" candle, showcasing innovative scent profiles with whimsical twists.

articles.title: After Western Digital, Teamgroup introduces another PCIe Gen5 64TB SSD, and this one will almost certainly be a bargain
articles.author: Efosa Udinmwen
articles.summary: TeamGroup has launched the T-CREATE MASTER Ai I5U U.2 PCIe 5.0 SSD, a 64TB high-capacity solid-state drive designed for enterprise workloads. This PCIe Gen5 SSD aims to meet the storage and speed demands of AI and cloud infrastructure.

articles.title: 3 Android 16 changes that just don't impress me at all
articles.author: Roger Fingas
articles.summary: Google is introducing Android 16 with updated dynamic color themes and interface animations. The Find Hub is a rebranded Android's Find My Devices app which comes with location sharing and item tracking. Gemini is expanding to Android Auto, Wear OS, Google TV, and Android XR for voice commands and information retrieval.

articles.title: Samsung's prototype XR glasses hint at the future of smart frames, and I'm closer to all-in than ever before
articles.author: Jacob Krol
articles.summary: Google showcased its Android XR smart glasses prototype, co-developed with Samsung. The glasses feature a screen for displaying information like time, weather, navigation, messages and translations, along with integrated access to Google's Gemini AI assistant for tasks such as providing weather reports and analyzing objects. Samsung will ship a final version of the Android XR headset.

articles.title: 29 Outdoor-Friendly Father's Day Gifts
articles.author: Mallory Mower
articles.summary: The article showcases new outdoor-related products for fathers. This includes an AI-powered smartphone stabilizer for capturing cinematic shots, and Reebok Voltage Smart Audio Sunglasses with Lucyd lenses, featuring Hi-Fi audio, sweat resistance, and long battery life for sports activities.

articles.title: McDonald's Big Mac Sauce Vs Big Arch Sauce: What's The Actual Difference?
articles.author: Dennis Lee
articles.summary: McDonald's is testing a new burger called the "Big Arch" in international locations like Portugal and Canada. The burger features two quarter-pound patties, three slices of cheese, crispy and fresh onions, pickles, lettuce, and a new "Big Arch" sauce on a sesame and poppyseed bun. The "Big Arch" sauce is a new formulation that includes tomato, differentiating it from the Big Mac sauce.

articles.title: 35 Game-Changing Products To Conquer Chore Day
articles.author: Mallory Mower
articles.summary: Windex introduced an outdoor glass cleaner, The Pink Stuff launched an All-Purpose Floor Cleaner, and Scrub Daddy released sponges with unique design features. Bissell offers a multipurpose carpet and upholstery cleaner and Angry Orange launched pet odor eliminator. Additionally, Scrubbing Bubbles released a toilet cleaning stamp and products are available for floors, lawns, kitchens and garbage disposal.

articles.title: T-Mobile offers amazing lifetime discount to some new customers
articles.author: Christy Rakoczy
articles.summary: T-Mobile is introducing a new 'Insider Discount' offer to attract and retain customers. This discount provides 20% off advertised voice line rates for customers on Experience More and Experience Beyond Plans, and is currently targeted towards T-Mobile home internet customers who are not yet cellular service subscribers. The offer aims to incentivize these customers to switch to T-Mobile cellular service, but is available for a limited time only.

articles.title: Some T-Mobile customers get massive new discount
articles.author: Christy Rakoczy
articles.summary: T-Mobile is introducing a new 'Insider Discount' offer, providing 20% off voice lines for the life of the account, to its home internet customers who are not yet cellular service subscribers. This discount is available to new customers selecting Experience More and Experience Beyond plans. The company intends to boost its customer base and mitigate churn by attracting home internet users to add cellular service.

articles.title: T-Mobile offers amazing lifetime discount to some new customers
articles.author: Christy Rakoczy
articles.summary: T-Mobile is offering a free Galaxy S25 Edge with any trade-in for customers signing up for the Experience Beyond plan. Additionally, their Switch And Pay Off Program provides up to $800 per line for switching carriers and a free iPhone 16 Pro.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge could spell end for 'Plus' model
articles.author: M Abdullah Hamid Gul
articles.summary: Samsung has introduced the Galaxy S25 Edge, priced at $1,099 for the 256GB model, positioning it between the Galaxy S25 and S25 Ultra. The S25 Edge is set to launch globally on May 30 and is expected to potentially replace the Galaxy S25 Plus due to its appealing design and similar price point.

articles.title: GAC's "Eco-system Globalization" Lands in Brazil, Marking Strategic Milestone in Latin America's Footprint.
org: Instituto Nacional de Metrologia, Qualidade e Tecnologia
articles.summary: GAC introduced five models for Brazilian consumers: AION V, AION Y, HYPTEC HT, GS4 HEV, and AION ES to address diverse mobility scenarios. EZVIZ launched the Multi-Lens Camera Series, including the Mixed Vision and Co-Action series, offering enhanced visual technology and smart protection for home security.

articles.title: GAC's
articles.author: info@kalkinemedia.com
org: Instituto Nacional de Metrologia, Qualidade e Tecnologia
articles.summary: GAC launched its "Brazil Action Plan" and introduced five new models (AION V, AION Y, HYPTEC HT, GS4 HEV, and AION ES) at the Brazil Brand Launch and New Models Unveiling Event in São Paulo. These models aim to address various mobility needs of Brazilian consumers. The company also signed an agreement with Instituto Nacional de Metrologia, Qualidade e Tecnologia (Inmetro) to enhance Brazil's automotive industry.

articles.title: GAC's "Eco-system Globalization" Lands in Brazil, Marking Strategic Milestone in Latin America's Footprint.
articles.author: CNW Group
org: Instituto Nacional de Metrologia, Qualidade e Tecnologia
articles.summary: GAC officially unveiled its "Brazil Action Plan" and introduced five new models including AION V, AION Y, HYPTEC HT, GS4 HEV, and AION ES at the Brazil Brand Launch event. The plan focuses on integrating into and contributing to Brazil through initiatives like full industry chain deployment, energy ecosystems, and talent development.

articles.title: Boden shoppers race to buy £110 'slimming' blue midi dress reduced to £50
articles.author: Nisha Mal
articles.summary: Boden has launched an online sale, featuring the Flora Cord Midi Dress at a discounted price. Roman has also released a new summer collection including the Printed Frill Border Maxi Dress.

articles.title: Father's Day gifts for golfers, foodies and garden lovers from £7, handpicked by our experts
articles.author: Grace Salmon
articles.summary: The article highlights several products ideal for Father's Day gifts. Dior introduces Sauvage Elixir, and Jo Malone features Cypress & Grapevine body spray. The Beefy Boys offer a DIY Burger Box, while Gozney presents the Roccbox pizza oven. New Balance promotes its 740 Men's Trainers, and ROKA London showcases the Canfield Backpack.

articles.title: 10 best LG washing machines that are a total game changer for laundry: Sensor wash, steam refresh and more
articles.author: Aishwarya Faraswal
articles.summary: LG offers a range of washing machines including top load, front load, and semi-automatic models with features like AI Direct Drive and TurboWash. Select models offer Wi-Fi connectivity for remote control and steam wash technology for allergen removal. LG's washing machines are designed for efficiency, convenience, and fabric care.

articles.title: Google's XR Glasses are the AI tech I've been waiting for
articles.author: Stephen Radochia
articles.summary: Google is developing XR glasses, which were previewed at Google I/O 2025. These glasses aim to provide a usable AI experience with features like real-time translation and AR overlays, running on Android XR. The success of these glasses depends on their reliability and accuracy.

articles.title: The Jordan Times to launch new website Monday
articles.summary: The Jordan Times is launching its redesigned website, featuring a more responsive, mobile-optimized layout with improved visual appeal and functionality. The updated platform offers intuitive navigation, faster load times, interactive elements, and enhanced accessibility options, all designed to improve the reader experience.

articles.title: 33 Products To Prove You're A Cool Aunt
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Crayola introduces Air Dry Clay, a kid-friendly crafting material that hardens without baking, offering a mess-free pottery experience. Hasbro launches Twister Splash, an updated version of Twister, which squirts water on players. Kodak releases an app-enabled instant phone photo printer, transforming phones into Polaroid cameras with editing capabilities.

articles.title: 48 Products To Solve Problems Around Your Home
articles.author: Curtis Teegardin
articles.summary: The article showcases a diverse range of new cleaning and home improvement products designed to tackle everyday household problems. These products include stain removers, odor eliminators, repair solutions, and organizational tools, providing innovative solutions for consumers looking to maintain and enhance their homes. For instance, there is a non-corrosive Green Gobbler Drain Clog Dissolver that'll help rid pipes of hair, soap, and toilet paper.

articles.title: This tiny smartphone is so affordable, you might not even care if you leave it in an Uber
articles.author: Stack Commerce
articles.summary: NanoPhone 4G, a credit-card-sized smartphone, is now available for under $90. It features front and rear cameras, GPS, 4G speeds, Wi-Fi, and compatibility with apps like WhatsApp and Instagram. It supports dual SIM cards and works with GSM and CDMA networks, making it a versatile and affordable option.

articles.title: The Basics Bundle
articles.author: Daisy Luther
articles.summary: The author is launching three different "bundles": a prepper resources bundle, a basic guides for emergencies bundle, and a printables bundle. These bundles are offered at a "name your price" model starting at $5 each, aiming to fund the author's upcoming move. Each bundle contains various resources and guides relevant to their respective themes, offering valuable information at a low price.

articles.title: Zong launches AI-powered cloud platform to support enterprise solutions
articles.author: Monitoring Desk
articles.summary: Zong has launched Z SAIS, an AI-enabled, locally hosted cloud platform designed to bolster Pakistan's digital infrastructure and facilitate enterprise cloud adoption. Z SAIS offers over 40 solutions across multiple business domains and is hosted in data centers in Islamabad and Lahore. The platform includes various services like Kubernetes, firewalls, and virtual desktop infrastructure, accessible via a unified interface.

articles.title: AI meets fashion: Google's 'Try It On' lets you virtually wear clothes
articles.author: Gargi Chaudhry
articles.summary: Google launched a new 'Try it on' feature at Google I/O 2025, which utilizes AI to provide realistic virtual apparel try-ons for users based on their body measurements and posture. This service aims to improve the online shopping experience by allowing users to visualize how clothes might look on them.

articles.title: Why the Switch 2 May Benefit from Xbox's Most Underpowered Console
articles.author: Sydney Butler
articles.summary: The Nintendo Switch 2 is anticipated to outperform the PlayStation 4 in terms of CPU, RAM, and GPU capabilities. Developers optimizing games for Xbox Series S may find it feasible to tailor them for Switch 2 as well. The console's expected capabilities are generating discussion about its potential market impact.

articles.title: Remove mould from washing machine using 1 item – not vinegar or baking soda
articles.author: Chanelle Georgina
articles.summary: Melissa Pateras, known as "laundrytok" on TikTok, demonstrated the use of Sugelary Mould and Mildew Stain Cleaner to effectively remove mould and mildew from a washing machine.  She applied the cleaning gel to mouldy areas, allowed it to sit, scrubbed it, and then ran a hot cycle to complete the cleaning process.

articles.title: Cloud Gaming on Android: Mobile Devices Power Console-Level Play
articles.author: Yackulic Khristopher
articles.summary: The article highlights cloud gaming services such as Xbox Cloud Gaming, GeForce NOW, and Amazon Luna, allowing users to play AAA games on Android devices without downloads. These services offer extensive game libraries and various performance tiers based on user needs and preferences, effectively providing access to console-quality gaming experiences on mobile platforms.

articles.title: I tried Google's new 'Try it on' AI shopping tool, and I'm impressed
articles.author: Timothy Beck Werth
articles.summary: Google launched a new "Try it on" feature in Google Shopping, an AI-powered virtual clothing try-on tool. This feature, part of Google Labs, allows users to upload a photo and virtually try on clothes. Users can access this feature through Search Labs by signing into their Google account.

articles.title: A new engineering marvel in ultra-thin hardware: Meet the Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge
articles.author: LIOR NOVIK/MAARIV
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics unveiled the Galaxy S25 Edge, a remarkably thin phone with a titanium frame and a 200MP camera. The device features the Snapdragon 8 Elite for Galaxy mobile platform and integrated Galaxy AI, providing professional-grade photography and personalized AI experiences.

articles.title: Father's Day gifts for golfers, foodies and garden lovers from £7
articles.author: Grace Salmon
articles.summary: Several companies are highlighted with their product offerings for Father's Day gifts. For instance, nutribullet collaborated with McLaren F1 Team to launch the 900 Series blender, and Beats introduced the Solo Buds, compact earbuds with high-quality sound. Additionally, Clean Co. offers Clean Whiskey, a non-alcoholic alternative, while The Beefy Boys provides a DIY Burger Box.

articles.title: Samsung unveils the Galaxy S25 Edge: Slim and lightweight
articles.summary: Samsung has unveiled its new smartphone, the Galaxy S25 Edge, featuring a slim design, a 6.7-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X display, and Qualcomm's Snapdragon 8 Elite processor. The phone includes a 200-megapixel main camera, 12GB of RAM, and Galaxy AI capabilities, with pre-orders starting today and availability in stores on May 30 with a free storage upgrade during pre-order.

articles.title: O 2025 Demo – Archyde: Latest World News, Economy, Entertainment, Health, Technology & Sports Updates
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Android XR glasses, powered by the Android XR platform and AI, are augmented reality eyewear designed for hands-free access to information and applications. Currently in prototype testing, these smart glasses use cameras and microphones to perceive the user's surroundings and deliver relevant information through speakers or an in-lens display, connecting to smartphones for full app functionality.

articles.title: I tried out mops – a £30 high street one beat Vax and Vileda when cleaning my kitchen
articles.author: Consumer reporter
articles.summary: The article reviews and compares various mops available on the market, including the Vileda Rinse Clean Spin Mop, Minky 4-in-1 Action Spray Mop, Flash Speed Mop Starter Kit, Aldi Easy Home Spin Mop, Karcher SE1 Upright Steam Mop, Bona Premium Spray Mop, Vax Steam Fresh Total Home Cleaner, and Lakeland Double-Sided Floor Mop. The review focuses on performance, value, and key features of each mop, offering insights into their suitability for different cleaning needs and floor types.

articles.title: 30 Affordable Walmart Dresses If You Have Lots Of Plans
articles.author: Emma Kershaw
articles.summary: Walmart offers a variety of dresses, including a lace-up corset midi dress, a printed cutout Sofia Vergara dress, and a green dress, with prices ranging from $6.96 to $75.99. The dresses are available in various sizes and colors, catering to different styles and occasions.

articles.title: This Cordless Dyson Vacuum Is My Ultimate Spring Cleaning Sidekick, and It's $150 Off for Memorial Day
articles.author: Katie Collins
articles.summary: The Dyson V15 cordless vacuum cleaner is being offered at $150 off during Dyson's Memorial Day sale, bringing the price down to $600. This model has received a CNET Editors' Choice Award and outperformed competitors in laboratory testing. The Dyson V15 is suitable for both quick clean-ups and deep cleans.

articles.title: 50 Exceedingly Useful Products From Small Businesses On Amazon You Might Not Know About
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Several new consumer products are introduced, spanning categories from beauty and personal care to home organization and technology. These products include Good Molecules Yerba Mate Wake Up Eye Gel, NeeDoh Gummy Bear sensory fidget toy, and Larq self-cleaning water bottle. The products aim to solve everyday problems and provide innovative solutions for consumers.

articles.title: Apple's New Accessibility Features – Archyde: Latest World News, Economy, Entertainment, Health, Technology & Sports Updates
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Accessibility Nutrition Labels are being introduced as a standard feature in app stores. These labels provide information about an app's accessibility features, such as VoiceOver support and text display options, allowing users to make informed decisions before downloading. This introduction aims to empower users and encourage developers to prioritize inclusivity.

articles.title: 27 Beauty Items In Amazon's 'Most Wished For' Section
articles.author: Curtis Teegardin
articles.summary: Sol de Janeiro introduced Hair And Body Fragrance Mist. Phlur launched Vanilla Skin body mist. Gold Bond released a firming neck and chest cream. Hawaiian Tropic launched a mineral powder sunscreen with SPF 30. Summer Fridays released "Pink Sugar" tinted lip butter balm. Eos launched Shea Butter Vanilla Cashmere body lotion. Shark introduced FlexStyle Air Styling hair tool. Tree Hut launched Vanilla Shea Sugar Scrub. Anua launched pore-clearing cleansing oil. Clean Skin Club launched Clean Towels. Tirtir launched cushion foundation. Laura Geller launched Balance-n-Brighten Color Correcting Foundation. Medicube launched Collagen Night Wrapping Mask and Jelly Cream. Grace & Stella launched under eye masks. Wonderskin launched Lip Stain in the shade "Whimsical". Nature Republic launched Honey Melting lip tint. Naturium launched The Glow Getter Multi-Oil Body Wash. Laneige launched lip sleeping mask. ColourPop launched "Going Coconuts" nude eyeshadow palette. Saltair launched Body Oil in the scent "Santal Bloom". OPI launched RapiDry Quick Dry nail polish. Glamnetic launched press-on nails. Biodance launched Bio-Collagen Real Deep masks. Medicube launched dual-textured toner pads.

articles.title: The Nintendo Switch 2 is in stock now - where shoppers can buy before it's ...
articles.author: Daily Record
articles.summary: Nintendo is releasing the Nintendo Switch 2 on June 5. The product has been sold out at multiple retailers for weeks.

articles.title: Zong launches local cloud platform
articles.author: Dawn
articles.summary: Zong has launched its locally-hosted cloud platform, Z SAIS, which is powered by AI capabilities, offering enterprise-grade performance, security, and low-latency features. This launch is intended to bolster the cloud ecosystem in Pakistan.

articles.title: Amazon Fashion's 'SERVE' Store Offers Convenience, Selection and Value to Gen Z, says Nikhil Sinha, ...
articles.author: India Today
articles.summary: Amazon Fashion's Director, Nikhil Sinha, announced the SERVE Store. The store aims to offer convenience, selection, and value. It targets the Gen Z demographic.

articles.title: Pokemon GO: Gigantamax Machamp Max Battle Day Research Tasks, Bonuses & Shiny Machop
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: Pokemon GO introduces Gigantamax Machamp as a feature of its Max Battle Day event. This marks the debut of a new Gigantamax Pokemon within the game.

articles.title: GAC Launched Localization Initiative in Brazil, Debuts Five Core Models in the Brazilian Market.
articles.author: Longview News-Journal
articles.summary: On May 23, 2025, GAC officially unveiled its "Brazil Action Plan" and launched new models at Distrito Anhembi in São Paulo, Brazil. The event marked GAC's Brazil Brand Launch and New Models Unveiling.

articles.title: Anthropic's Claude AI gets smarter, and mischievous
articles.author: Qatar Tribune
articles.summary: Anthropic launched its latest Claude generative model.

articles.title: Amazon has the Dyson Airstrait on sale for the first time ever in this brand ...
articles.author: Lehigh Valley
articles.summary: Dyson releases new Jasper Plum colorways for its hair tools. This represents a brand-new color release for their latest hair tools.
